snippet: Doctors and patients complained of numerous mistakes about crucial facts like which physicians were in which network, and what they specialized in.
abstract: California health care exchange takes down its physician directories amid continuing complaints from both doctors and patients that the lists of doctors and hospitals included in each insurance plan were error-riddled and unreliable.
lead_paragraph: Doctors and patients complained of numerous mistakes about crucial facts like which physicians were in which network, and what they specialized in.

headline.main: California’s Physician Directories Removed Because of Errors
headline.print_headline: California’s Physician Directories Removed Because of Errors
